
## Read in data

```{r}
ces3demo <- read_csv(here("data","ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```


```{r}
ces3demo %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score))
```
